item.description:
Hi All Deliberate Creators!

If you're just learning about LOA or still can't quite figure out how to consciously attract what you want in your life, join us! Bring your questions and an open mind. This meeting is great for those who feel like they are just getting started or are not consistent in attracting what they put out there.

We will meet in the back enclosed off room from7:00-8:30pm.

Panera Bread is in a small plaza of shops after Kelly's, next to Marshalls and across the street from Target off the the Lynn Fells Pkwy. It is on the South side of Route 1. Read more
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me in or near the back room

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Intro To the Law of Attraction
